The RecyclerView is a flexible display method.
It is a container for displaying large data sets that can be scrolled very efficiently by maintaining a limited number of views.
It is often used when you have data collections whose elements change at runtime based on user action or network events.
This application was developed by Cordélia BARTMANN et Maélie DESSAPT, Master 1 students at ESIEA engineering school\n

It gathers the following Android concepts : 

 • Basic graphic interfaces 
 • Dynamic graphic elements 
 • Several screens 
 • Downloading Service fitted with a end of download warning notification 
 • Processing of the downloaded data as well as its display in a dynamic list.
